SEARCH
Package de.tha.tools

Class Drawable

java.lang.Object
de.tha.tools.Drawable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Circle, Image, Line, Polygon, Text
public abstract class Drawable extends Object
Abstract base class for drawable objects, encapsulating essential properties such as color, position, border, and orientation. Provides basic functionalities for handling positioning, colors, borders, and orientation, with subclasses implementing specific shapes.

  • Method Details

    • setLineWidth

      public static void setLineWidth(float width)
      Sets the global line width for all drawable objects. This line width will apply to all current and future Drawable instances unless individually overridden.
      Parameters:
      width - the new line width to set for all drawable objects

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition(int x, int y)
      Sets the position of the object, applying a fixed offset for alignment within the window.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the new position
      y - the y-coordinate of the new position

    • getXframe

      public int getXframe()
      Retrieves the x-coordinate of the object, adjusted by the left offset.
      Returns:
      the adjusted x-coordinate in the frame

    • getYframe

      public int getYframe()
      Retrieves the y-coordinate of the object, adjusted by the top offset.
      Returns:
      the adjusted y-coordinate in the frame

    • setBorderColor

      public void setBorderColor(Color color)
      Sets the border color of the object.
      Parameters:
      color - the new color for the border

    • getBorderColor

      public Color getBorderColor()
      Returns the current border color of the object.
      Returns:
      the current border color

    • setHasBorder

      public void setHasBorder(boolean hasBorder)
      Sets whether the object should display a border.
      Parameters:
      hasBorder - true to enable the border, false to disable it

    • setColor

      public void setColor(Color color)
      Sets the fill color of the object.
      Parameters:
